mode: <dataset evaluation>, <dataset split evaluation>, <dataset split comparison>, <performance by interaction>, <model_probing>
codex_directory: <directory where input materials for CODEX experiments reside>
output_directory: <name of directory to save CODEX experiments to>
bin_directory: <directory of binning file relative to codex_directory>
universe: <dictionary of universe> or <pathway to universe JSON file> or <null> if constructing universe via binning file.
split_file: <list of split files>/<name of single split file>
performance_file: <list of corresponding performance files>/<name of single performance file>
metric: <name or list of names of performance metric as in performance file>
timed_output: true/false of whether to include the timestamp part of experiment outputs
training_params: <NOT FUNCTIONAL> training parameters for systematic inclusion/exclusion experiment.
